message.content: how to clear direnv of cached dev shell

content.text: I'll help you clear direnv's cached dev shell. Let me check your current direnv setup and provide the commands to clear the cache.

content.content:
direnv exec path /nix/store/hmyw95241yig9b7bng1kazinki214gn5-direnv-2.36.0/bin/direnv
DIRENV_CONFIG /etc/direnv
bash_path /nix/store/smkzrg2vvp3lng3hq7v9svfni5mnqjh2-bash-interactive-5.2p37/bin/bash
disable_stdin false
warn_timeout 5s

content.text:
To clear direnv's cached dev shell:

```bash
# Option 1: Clear and reload
direnv reload

# Option 2: Force full cache clear
rm -rf .direnv/nix-profile-*
direnv allow
```

The first option reloads the environment. The second option completely removes cached Nix profiles and rebuilds from scratch, which is useful if you've made changes to your Nix configuration.
